Package prefuse.action.distortion

Actions modules which distort the presentation space to support enhanced navigation and browsing.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BifocalDistortion Computes a bifocal distortion of space, magnifying a focus region of space and uniformly demagnifying the rest of the space.
Distortion Abstract base class providing a structure for space-distortion techniques.
FisheyeDistortion Computes a graphical fisheye distortion of a graph view.
 

Package prefuse.action.distortion Description

Actions modules which distort the presentation space to support enhanced navigation and browsing. Most distortion techniques magnify a "focal" region of space, allocating more screen space and showing items in higher detail. Non-focal space is compressed/demagnified, but remains visible to keep everything in context.
